subject: A slew of "no"'s
author: Adriana Jones
full_text:
When my husband asked whether or not reincarnation is real, he was met with a slew of "no"'s.  We know better than to believe anything they say one way or the other, but we do recognize that this is excellent proof of intelligent communication... how often do you scan the dial and get like five or six "no"'s this close together?

See "reincar-no" file in my folder "Adriana's files" in the files section.
